title: What is the best engineering college in the United States? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United States of America

response.answer_text: There are hundreds. Pick any of top names below. MIT Caltech Stanford UC berkeley northwestern Illinois San Diego Davis Santa Barbara Irvine UCLA Columbia RPI Harvard northwestern UPenn Carnegie Mellon Georgiatech VPI Texas Austin A&M Baylor Houston Texas Tech USC Loyola Long Beach state Pennstate Missouri Kansas Kansas State Iowa Iowa state Washington St. Louis Duke NC state Clemson Washington Oregon Oregon State Arizona Arizona State Rice Caltech Purdue Indiana Wayne State Wisconsin Michigan Michigan State Harvey Mudd calpoly pamona Cal poly San Louis Obispo Georgia Tech Univ. Rochester Missouri State Washington University Fresno State UC Merced UC Santa Cruz oregon State and more

There’s a legendary private research university whose reputation is well-known that many movies, television shows, and comic books speak of it. It’s the stuff of marvels. Or of Marvel (e.g., Tony Stark, James Rhodes, Killmonger, Reed Richards, …) MIT in popular culture - Wikipedia
